actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, the Judiciary, and Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To amend the Fentanyl Sanctions Act to strengthen the imposition of sanctions under that Act, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fentanyl Reduction Engrained by Economic Deterrence Act

titles.title: Fentanyl Reduction Engrained by Economic Deterrence Act
To amend the Fentanyl Sanctions Act to strengthen the imposition of sanctions under that Act, and for other purposes.
